name: Ebbshore Bay
role_in_state: Primary maritime trade, shipbuilding and reagent transshipment hub
economy_niches: Long-distance maritime trade & transshipment of reagents
Storage and refinement of imported ritual reagents
culture_adjustments: Stronger guild authority; dock-guild courts resolve most disputes
Apprenticeship bonds longer and more formal than state norm
Practical ritualism focused on tide rites and harbor safety
Local Coastal Tongues dialect heavy with navigational lexicon
Ancestor veneration emphasizes drowned kin and seafarer memorials
constraints: Heavy dependence on imported ritual reagents
Harbour depth limits largest oceanic warships and cargoers
notes: Major transshipment point for reagents used in state ritual industries
Extensive salt pans on ebb flats; salterns controlled by merchant houses
Apprenticeships enforceable by guild courts; bonded labor common in yards
